definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
to smash/to pound/to fail/to muck up/to bungle

sentences.english: EU leaders have in effect condoned Russias smash and grab.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟領導人實際上是寬恕了俄國的打砸搶。

sentences.english: The acting mayor offered an apology to the striking taxi drivers as the protest continued.
sentences.chinese: 代理市長在罷工期間向受打砸損失的出租車司機致歉。

sentences.english: He used a sword to try to defend his shop from a rampaging mob.
sentences.chinese: 他拿了一把劍試圖保護自己的店不受鬧事暴徒的打砸。

definition: to beat up/to come to blows/battery (law)
violent crime/to commit a violent act (assault or murder)
to cause trouble/to provoke a dispute
to break in/to force a door
to cause trouble/to create a disturbance
to vent personal spite/to act out of malice (esp. of crime)
to wound with a blade or hatchet/to slash/to gash
